attributes.action: recognise Paganism and Wicca and encourage the teaching of Paganism and Wicca in all schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: most religions are taught in schools but Paganism, which is possibly the most important religion in terms of this countrys culture is glossed over. Wicca shares many Pagan values but is also skipped which creates predjustice and discrimination because of the negative views brodcast by the media. Both need to be recognised and taught in schools.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "recognise Paganism and Wicca and encourage the teaching of Paganism and Wicca in all schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22822


Prime Minister's Office
